text.section: In addition to any other penalty provided by law, a person that willfully violates this title or any regulation adopted under this title is subject to a penalty of $1,000 for the first day of violation and $100 for each additional day that the violation continues.

Before imposing a penalty under this subsection, the Commissioner:
shall give the person that allegedly committed the violation notice and an opportunity for hearing; and
must find that the person willfully committed the violation.
